duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs work indicated on Approved Repair Orders, following industry standard procedures and ensuring benefits for member/customer.
Test drives vehicles to diagnose performance issues, verifies repairs, and maintains a clean and safe work environment.
Attends and completes annual auto repair training, maintains customer vehicles, and communicates effectively with managers and service advisors.
Ensures safety and accuracy of repairs, performs vehicle inspections, and may require travel to different locations as needed.

education_certification.credential: ASE Master Tech with L1 certification level or equivalent, OEM certifications, and valid driver’s license with a safe driving record. Smog Repair and Testing Certification preferred (CA only)
